property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This creature and that creature battle. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Liquid People. When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's psychic creatures and return it to his hyperspatial zone. Whenever this creature attacks, return all creatures in the battle zone that have 'blocker' to their owners' hands. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: While all cards in your mana zone are darkness cards, this creature gets +2000 power. Whenever this creature attacks, if all cards in your mana zone are darkness cards, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge for each of your Dragons in the battle zone. Each time you win, destroy one of your opponent's commands or a creature that has power 7000 or less. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of his deck and then puts it on the bottom of his deck. If your revealed card costs the same as or greater than your opponent's revealed card, you win.) Speed attacker Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you reveal this card during Gachinko Judge or when you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap or untap a creature in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all non-psychic creatures that have power 3000 or less. Then destroy all psychic creatures that have power 5000 or less. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your Dragons battles, that Dragon gets +7000 power. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms While battling, this creature gets +1000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution Dragon, you may put it into the battle zone. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a number of 6 or less. Destroy all creatures that cost the same as the chosen number. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. Whenever your Dragons attack, if you say 'Gaiginga! Dragsolution!', you may choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Those 2 creatures battle. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, you may show a fire creature to your opponent and destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has that creatures power or less. Mana Arms Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When one of your fire creatures wins a battle, you may put this creature from your hand into the battle zone. Whenever one of your other fire creatures battle, you may have this creature battle instead. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the creature equipped with is tapped for the first time each turn, untap it. Dragsolution Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each turn, when this creature is tapped for the first time, untap it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a fire dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) While battling, this creature gets +3000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the creature equipped with is tapped for the first time each turn, untap it. Dragsolution Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each turn, when this creature is tapped for the first time, untap it. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures that have power 3000 or less. Speed attacker Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: This turn, the next creature you summon may cost up to 3 less. It can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Power Attacker +5000 Triple breaker Players can't put psychic creatures into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shuffle your hand into your deck and draw 4 cards. Then, you may put a non-evolution Command Dragon that costs 7 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

card.name: Varz Romanov, Dark Lord of Demons

property.name: Rules
property.value: Graveyard evolution—Choose a darkness creature in your graveyard and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's non-evolution creatures. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Double breaker When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature and this creature battle. When you put this creature into the battle zone during your opponent's turn, put this creature on the bottom of your deck at the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana evolution—Choose a nature creature in your mana zone and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. Shield Force

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} One of your creatures in the battle zone gets +1000 power until the end of the turn. Choose one of your opponent's creatures, those 2 creatures battle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponent attacks one of your fire Dragons, if you have no 'Batoraio Deluxe, Passion Reversal ' in the battle zone, you may put this creature from your hand into the battle zone. Double breaker Whenever one of your other fire creatures battles your opponent's creatures, you may have this creature battle instead. While battling, this creature gets +5000 power.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Each of your other Dragons in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'. (A creature that has 'speed attacker' doesn't get summoning sickness.) Double breaker

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Non-light spells cost 2 more to cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all non-psychic creatures that cost 3 or less. Then destroy all psychic creatures that cost 9 or less. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever this creature attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card's a Dragon, put it into the battle zone. If it's not a Dragon, put it into your graveyard. Power Attacker +1000

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. From among them, you may show a fire creature to your opponent and destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has that creatures power or less. Mana Arms Shuffle your deck.

Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a fire dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) While battling, this creature gets +3000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a nature dragheart that costs 4 or less or a dragheart that costs 2 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) When this creature would be destroyed, put it into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The creature equipped with this can attack untapped creatures. Dragsolution Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. (Dragonoids don't count.) They can't cost less than 2.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your fire creatures win a battle, you may draw a card. Dragsolution Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures win a battle, you may draw a card. While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, each of your creatures in the battle zone gets 'speed attacker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the ability of one of your opponent's creatures or spells, you may put it into the battle zone instead. When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a 'Hachiko, Jin's Faithful Dog ' from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 3 cards. If you do, put 2 cards from your hand on top of your deck, bottom of your deck or both in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Dragons in the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your Angel Commands. Players can't summon creatures other than light creatures or cast spells other than light spells. Triple breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may summon this creature by destroying 3 of your creatures instead of paying its cost. Whenever this creature attacks, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a water dragheart that costs 4 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures that costs 6 or less in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Put up to 2 non-evolution light creatures that have 'blocker' from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone or when this creature leaves the battle zone, you and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, choose one of the following. :► Put a Victory creature or a creature that costs 10 or more from your hand into the battle zone.:► Search your deck. Take a Victory creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Double breaker Mana Arms 7: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 7 or more fire cards in your mana zone, choose one of the following.:► Put a non-weapon card that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone.:► While this creature is not equipped with a weapon, put a weapon that costs 6 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone and equip it to this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: A creature equipped with this gets 'blocker'. Dragsolution Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each Dragon in your mana zone, look at the top card of your deck. You may put a non-evolution Dragon from among it that costs 8 or less into the battle zone and put the rest on the bottom of the deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a non-evolution creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. Choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone and put it into his battle zone. Then, choose one of your creatures and one of your opponent's creatures and put them in their owner's mana zones.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When this creature would be discarded by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or ability of a creature, you may put it into the battle zone instead. When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all creatures that have 'blocker' from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may draw a card. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more water cards in your mana zone, this creature can't be attacked or blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a player. You may destroy one of that player's creatures. If you do, choose a non-evolution creature except 'Babelginus, Demonic Dragon ' from that player's graveyard and put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 3 or more light cards in your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it. Mana Arms 5: When this creature would leave the battle zone and has power 0 or more, if you have 5 or more light cards in your mana zone, this creature stays in the battle instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a dragheart that costs 3 or less or a darkness dragheart that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (If it's a weapon, equip it to this creature.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature can't be attacked by creatures that cost 4 or less. Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, this creature gets 'double breaker' and 'power attacker +4000'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} This creature can't attack. When this creature wins a battle, destroy it. When this creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.value: While one of your fire creatures is attacking, it gets +1000 power for each of your fire cards in your graveyard. Dragsolution Hyperspatial Dragheart Fortress

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one of your creatures attacks, that creature gets +3000 power for each of your fire cards in your graveyard. World breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle, put a fire weapon that costs 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (Equip it to this creature.) Mana Arms Weapons that have the same name can't be equipped to this creature. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Dragsolution: When the equipped creature would leave the battle zone by the effect of one of your opponent's spells or creature ability, flip this dragheart to the creature side and untap it instead. Hyperspatial Dragheart

property.name: Rules
property.value: While battling, this creature gets +4000 power. Double breaker

property.value: Each of your other creatures in the battle zone gets the Gaial Command Dragon race. Power Attacker +2000 Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone. At the end of each of your turns, put a card from your mana zone into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 or more fire cards in your mana zone, your Command Dragons may each cost up to 2 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put all light and darkness cards from among them into your hand, and put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your light creatures. Double breaker Escape

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution—Put on one of your fire Dragons. Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, he chooses 3 cards in his mana zone and puts the rest into his graveyard. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has 'blocker' that costs 6 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has 'blocker'. Double breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your shields and add it to your hand. Then you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. (You may use 'shield trigger' ability of a shield added put into your hand in this way.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may destroy this creature. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
